content: and pull up a loop there should be 2 loops in the hook yarn over with new color and pull through both loops and continue pattern make sure to keep the gauge tight for both yarns during the color change so the stitch isn t loose ❖ when crocheting in the round crochet in continuous rounds without a slip_stitch and chain 1 at the beginning of each round simply end each round with single_crochet or whatever stitch is indicated for the pattern and move the stitch marker up and continue ❖ note the pictures and directions in this pattern are for right handed crocheting some of the
